attributes.action: change the working conditions of MP's to reflect the working conditions of the people they represent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nothing will change in this country while we are ruled by a political class that effectively lives outside the law and does not have to contend with what the common person does on a daily basis. We need new laws. MP's should, by law, work for the national average wage,about £28,000, more than enough.  All politicians, by law, should travel on public transport, it would soon improve and become safe if they had to use it!!! All politicians, by law, should send their kids to state schools, we'd soon see education standards pick up. All politicians should, by law have to use the NHS and go to the back of queues for treatment, I bet the hospitals would soon improve.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
